WorkItem.Description:
I used epic gem in my gear, but not allowed it for optimizer in Gemming Templates (ofc. gems are expensive, I use it only when it drop me).
 
When start Optimizer, it ask me:
 
The following currently equipped items are not available
 
Brilliant Queen's Garnet is not available
 
You most likely ......
 
Would you like to make them available and continue with the optimization?
 
And buttons Yes   No Cancel
 
First: two questions: available and contiue is bad, because what I need to press when I like not to make available but like to continue with the optimization.
Better will be .... for optimization?
 
Second: when I press:
Yes - optimizer ask me infinitely again and again .... (I do not know what you planed to do during optimize process, but expect that epic gem will be available in all cases where is reasonable to use it = player have many epic gems)
 
No - stop asking but not keep epic gem in my weared gear in result of optimization. I suggest to leave it not changed but not use epic gems in rest gear items.
WorkItem.Summary: Bug in Optimizer starting process Rawr 4.3.2b

Comments.Message: What you'll want to do is mark your item with epic gem with blue diamond instead of the green one (using shift click).
Also can you post the character xml where this happened? Selecting yes is supposed to mark the gem available, it shouldn't loop infinitely, so there seems to be something wrong going there.

xml attached I test it again right before attached.

Thx blue diamond working nice. I forgot this possibility. my fault.
